name: eqWAlizer: incompatible_types


name: eqWAlizer: incompatible_types
description:

```lang=error,counterexample
`'an_atom'`.

Expression has type:   'an_atom'
```

name: eqWAlizer: incompatible_types
eqWAlizer: incompatible_types
eqWAlizer: incompatible_types
description:
```lang=error,counterexample
`X`.

Expression has type:   id(#{a := 'va', b := #{c := #{d := pid(), e := pid()}}})
Context expected type: #{a := 'va', b := #{c := id(#{d := atom(), e := atom()})}}
```
```
Because in the expression's type:
  #{ b =>
    #{ c =>
      #{ d =>
        Here the type is:     pid()
        Context expects type: atom()
      , ... }
    , ... }
  , ... }
```
> [docs on `incompatible_types`](https://fb.me/eqwalizer_errors#incompatible_types)
